Info

T2K Theses (T2K-THESIS-nnn)

Switch to Catagorized View

T2K theses are those prepared by graduate students in the T2K collaboration to complete their degrees. The final version should be submitted by the student.

Number Name Title Folder Created
T2K-THESIS-001 Ian Taylor Development of T2K 280m Near Detector Software for Muon and Photon Reconstruction 2009-07-11
T2K-THESIS-002 P. T. Le Event reconstruction and energy calibration using cosmic muons for the T2K pizero detector. 2010-02-26
T2K-THESIS-003 Pawel Przewlocki A study of neutrino interactions constituting the background to electron neutrino appearance in T2K experiment 2010-06-19
T2K-THESIS-004 Ben Still T2K ND280 Pi0 Electromagnetic Calorimeter 2010-07-22
T2K-THESIS-005 Claudio Giganti Particle Identification in the T2K TPCs and study of the electron neutrino component in the T2K neutrino beam 2010-10-22
T2K-THESIS-006 Martin Haigh Beam extrapolation and photosensor testing for the T2K experiment 2011-02-10
T2K-THESIS-007 Antony Carver Electron identification in and performance of the ND280 Calorimeter 2011-02-10
T2K-THESIS-008 Kodai Matsuoka Measurement of the Neutrino Beam with the Muon Monitor and the First Result of the T2K Long-Baseline Neutrino Oscillation Experiment 2011-05-22
T2K-THESIS-009 Gavin Davies Understanding and calibrating the DS-ECal for T2K's ND280 2011-09-05
T2K-THESIS-010 Scott Oser Martyn Bryant MSc thesis (UBC): Plastic Scintillators for the T2K Fine-Grained Detector 2011-11-25
T2K-THESIS-011 Simon Hastings The Saturation Calibration of Tokai to Kamioka Fine Grained Scintillator Detector 2011-11-25
